1.name: Rock-Paper-Cannon Salvo
1.description: Increases this ship's FP by 5.0% (15.0%) and its armor modifier against Light Armor enemies by 4.5% (12.0%). 5s after this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a randomly chosen Lv.1 (Lv.10) barrage using special ammo.

2.name: Super Mega Explosion
2.description: When this ship fires its Main Guns: heals 2 random ships in your fleet for 5.0% of their max HP and, with a 45.0% (75.0%) chance, fires a Lv.1 (Lv.10) special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). The barrage has a 70% chance to inflict a special burn DoT, which reduces Firepower, Torpedo, and Aviation stats by 5% for burning enemies. The burn lasts for 30 seconds.

2.name: Summer Angel on the Shore
2.description: Whoa, the sea is so pretty~! It's as beautiful as the Venus Islands! I'm so blown away, I don't even feel the heat anymore!

1.chinese: 请问，您就是“指挥官”吗？啊，太好了！初次见面，我是穗香！虽然不知道能帮忙到什么程度，不过我很擅长学习的~总之…请多指教！
1.chineseTL: Umm, are you the "commander"? Ah, great! Nice to meet you, I'm Honoka! Although I don't know how much I can help, but I'm a great learner~but...nice to meet you!
1.japanese: あの…あなたが「指揮官」さんですか？あ、よかった！初めまして、わたしはほのかって言います！どこまでお役にたてるかわかりませんが…よろしくお願いしますね！
1.english: Um... Are you the Commander? Oh, perfect! It's nice to meet you. My name is Honoka! I don't know how much I'll be able to help, but... let's be friends!

2.chinese: 自我介绍吗…？我是穗香，最喜欢祖母！然后是…喜欢格斗技！我很擅长模仿哦，格斗电影里的招式什么的，看一眼就能学会了！之前学的时候还不小心把电视弄坏了…啊，那个…要对大家…保密哦~？
2.chineseTL: Self-Introduction...? I'm Honoka, and I love my grandma! And...wrestling! I'm good at imitation, like the wrestling moves on TV, just watching it once and I'm able to do it! Once I even broke my TV learning the moves...ah, that one...should be kept a secret?
2.japanese: 自己紹介ですか？名前は、ほのかって言います！おばあちゃんが大好きで、あとは…プロレスも好きです！よくテレビを見ながら真似しているんですよ？わたし、モノマネが得意ですから♪この前もテレビを壊しちゃって…あ、えっと…みんなには…ナイショだよ？
2.english: An introduction? My name is Honoka. I love my Grammy! Also... I really like pro wrestling! I watch it on TV a lot and act out the scenes. I'm super good at imitations! The other day I broke my TV... Oh, um... promise me... you won't tell anyone.

3.chinese: 请问，您就是“指挥官”吗？啊，太好了！初次见面，我是穗香！虽然不知道能帮忙到什么程度，不过我很擅长学习的~总之…请多指教！
3.chineseTL: Umm, are you the "commander"? Ah, great! Nice to meet you, I'm Honoka! Although I don't know how much I can help, but I'm a great learner~but...nice to meet you!
3.japanese: あの…あなたが「指揮官」さんですか？あ、よかった！初めまして、わたしはほのかって言います！どこまでお役にたてるかわかりませんが…よろしくお願いしますね！
3.english: Um... Are you the Commander? Oh, perfect! It's nice to meet you. My name is Honoka! I don't know how much I'll be able to help, but... let's be friends!

4.chinese: 要开始今天的工作了吗？辛苦了呢，指挥官！
4.chineseTL: Are we starting today's work? Good work, commander!
4.japanese: お疲れ様です、指揮官さん！いまからお仕事ですか？
4.english: Good work, Commander! Wait, you're starting work now?

5.chinese: 要吃饭、还是洗澡，还是…我？呵呵♪那就和我一起玩吧~
5.chineseTL: Do you want to eat, take a shower, or...me? Hehe ♪ then let's play together~
5.japanese: ごはんと、お風呂と…わたし！どれにしますか？ふふっ♪じゃあ、わたしと遊んでもらいますね！
5.english: Dinner, a bath, or... me? What will you have? Hehe~ Okay, then let's go play!

6.chinese: 今天也要让玛莉教我更多的东西，嗯！
6.chineseTL: Today I want to let Marie Rose teach me even more, Mhm!
6.japanese: 今日もマリーちゃんに、いろんなこと教えてもらうんだから！
6.english: I learned a lot of things from Marie today!

7.chinese: 呼…呼……哈啊！一不小心就发起呆来了呢…我、我可没有睡着哦？
7.chineseTL: Hoo...Hoo...Aaah! I was staring into space...I, I was not sleeping?
7.japanese: ふ、ふわぁ～……なんかぼーっとしてきちゃった…ね、寝てませんよ？
7.english: Yaaawn... Everything's so fuzzy... I-I'm not asleep!

8.chinese: 指挥官♪那个，有没有什么我能帮忙的呀？
8.chineseTL: Commander ♪ umm, is there anything I can help with?
8.japanese: 指揮官さん?あの…わたし、何かお手伝いすることないですか？
8.english: Commander! Um... Is there anything I can help out with?

9.japanese: え？お手伝い…して欲しいんですか？
9.english: Eh? Would you... like me to help?

10.chinese: 呀！哇哇哇…就算是指挥官也不可以哦！
10.chineseTL: Ah! Wh-Wah...even if you're the commander you're still not allowed to do that!
10.japanese: へっ！？はわわわ…指揮官さんでもだめですよ！
10.english: Eep! Wh-whoa... There's a limit to what you can get away with, Commander!

11.chinese: 欸嘿嘿，总觉得，有点开心…
11.chineseTL: Ehehe, I feel, kind of happy...
11.japanese: えへへ、なんだか、嬉しいな…
11.english: Hehehe, this makes me feel happy...

12.chinese: 任务？指挥官每天都要完成这些东西吗？
12.chineseTL: Missions? Does commander have to complete these every day?
12.japanese: 任務？指揮官さんは毎日これをやっているんですか？
12.english: Missions? Do you do these everyday?

13.chinese: 任务完成了！…哦哦，这些都是报酬吗？指挥官，真厉害呢！
13.chineseTL: The missions are complete! Ooh, are these the rewarwds? Commander, you're amazing!
13.japanese: 任務完了です！わあ…！こんなにご褒美もらえるんですか？！指揮官さん、すごいです！
13.english: Mission complete! Wow, and they give you this many rewards for it?! Commander, you're amazing!

14.chinese: 指挥官，你的信件哦！嘿嘿，我要不要也试着写一封信给奶奶呢~
14.chineseTL: Commander, your mail! Hehe, should I write a letter to Grandma?
14.japanese: 指揮官さんに、メールですよ！わたしもおばあちゃんに送ってみようかな～
14.english: There's some mail for you, Commander! I should write some mail to Grammy as well~

15.chinese: 指挥官，欢迎回来！一路上有遇到什么好玩的事情吗？
15.chineseTL: Commander, welcome back! did anything interesting happen on the way?
15.japanese: 指揮官さん、おかえりなさい！なにか面白いこと、ありました？
15.english: Commander, welcome back! Did anything interesting happen?

16.chinese: 委托完成了！清点就交给我吧，指挥官，我之前就经常有在帮奶奶的忙呢！
16.chineseTL: The commissions are complete! Leave the inventory to me, commander, I've helped grandma out a lot before!
16.japanese: 委託完了～！後はわたしにお任せください♪よく、おばあちゃんのお手伝いをしてるから、きっと大丈夫です♪
16.english: Commission complete~! Leave the rest to me~ I've helped Grammy out lots, so I'll be fine~

17.japanese: ほのか、パワーアップ！です！

18.japanese: よーし！気合い入れて行くぞー！

19.chinese: 呼呼~把气氛炒起来了呢~
19.japanese: うふふ、盛り上がってきましたね～

20.chinese: 啊呜…已经使不上力了啦~
20.japanese: ふにゅ～…もう力がでません～
20.english: Ohh~... I'm all out of energy~

22.chinese: 哇啊啊啊…陷入危机了啦~
22.japanese: はわわわ…大ピンチですよ～
22.english: Oh no, oh no... I'm in big trouble here!

23.chinese: 呜呜呜，我要回老家找奶奶去了！
23.chineseTL: Ughh, I'm going back to my grandma!
23.japanese: うう…わたし、おばあちゃんのとこに帰ります……
23.english: Ughh... I just want to go back to my Grammy's place...

24.chinese: 嗯~…天气好的时候，人的心情就会跟着好呢~今天也在港区里散散步吧！
24.chineseTL: Mm~...when the weather is good, people's mood is also good~ let's take a walk around the port!
24.japanese: んーっ！天気がいいと、気分もいいですね～今日も港でお散歩です♪
24.english: Mmh! The weather's so nice, I feel great~ Let's take a stroll around the port!

25.chinese: 指挥官，回头陪我去商店街逛逛吧？我想给奶奶带点纪念品什么的~
25.chineseTL: Commander, later let's go shopping? I want to get grandma some souvenirs~
25.japanese: 指揮官さん、あとでわたしのお買い物に付き合ってもらえませんか？おばあちゃんにお土産買ってあげたいんです！
25.english: Commander, won't you come shopping with me later? I want to buy some souvenirs for Grammy!

26.chinese: 指挥官！我把这里的事都写信告诉奶奶了哦！“有着指挥官和很多很多女孩子的有趣的地方”，这样~嘻嘻，有机会的话，就让指挥官见见奶奶吧！
26.chineseTL: Commander! I've told grandma everything about this place! "and interesting place where a commander and a lot of girls are", like this~hehe, if there's a chance, I want commander to visit grandma!
26.japanese: 指揮官さん！おばあちゃんにお手紙を送ったんです！ここが「指揮官さんと、女の子がいっぱいいる楽しいところ」って書いたんですよ♪えへへ♪あ、今度、指揮官さんにもおばあちゃんのこと紹介しますね！
26.english: Commander! I sent a letter to Grammy! I wrote that this is a fun place, with the Commander and many girls~ Hehehe~ Oh, next time, I'll show you around Grammy's place!

27.chinese: 在这个港区受到了指挥官和各位小伙伴的很多照顾呢！特别是指挥官，给穗香一种奶奶般的安心感~作为回报，无论有什么需要做的，都可以和我说哦！
27.chineseTL: You and everyone have given me such good care at this port! Especially commander, you gave Honoka a feeling of safety like grandma~in return, if you need anything, just ask!
27.japanese: この港で、指揮官さんとみんなにいっぱいお世話になりました！特に指揮官さんといると、おばあちゃんといるみたいで安心するんです！いつものお礼に、わたしにしてほしいことあったら何でも言ってくださいね！
27.english: Commander, you and everyone else here have taken such good care of me! When I'm with you, I feel relaxed, as if I'm back at home with Grammy! In return, please let me know if there's anything I can do for you!

28.chinese: 啊哇哇哇哇…要把这个看起来就很贵重的戒指，送给穗香吗？…要跟奶奶报告一下才行了呢！嗯！我会把这个当作一生的宝物的！欸嘿嘿~
28.chineseTL: Awahwahwahwah...You want to give this ring that looks very valuaable, to Honoka?...I just report to grandma! Mmh! I'll treat this as a treasure! Ehehe~
28.japanese: はわわわ…こんな貴重なもの、わたしがもらっていいんですか？お、おばあちゃんに伝えないと…！えっと…これ、わたしの一生の宝物にしますね！えへへ♪
28.english: Wh-what... Is it okay to give me something so valuable? I-I'll have to tell Grammy...! Um... I'll treasure this for all my life! Hehehe~

29.chinese: (Sortie with Marie Rose) 玛莉！要一起加油哦！
29.chineseTL: (Sortie with Marie Rose) Marie! Let's work hard together!
29.japanese: (Sortie with Marie Rose) マリーちゃん！一緒に頑張ろう
29.english: (Sortie with Marie Rose) Marie! Let's do our best!

30.chinese: (Sortie with Fusou, Yamashiro) 拔除邪恶！嘿嘿，是这种感觉吗~
30.chineseTL: (Sortie with Fusou, Yamashiro) Begone evil spirits! Hehe, is this how you do it~
30.japanese: (Sortie with Fusou, Yamashiro) 悪霊退散！えへへ、こんな感じですか～？
30.english: (Sortie with Fusou, Yamashiro) Evil spirits, begone! Hehehe, is that how you do it~?

1.chinese: 嗯~…真是片美丽的海滩~完全不输维纳斯群岛啊~欸嘿嘿，夏日的炎炎热浪，都被这凉凉的海水驱散了呢~
1.chineseTL: Mmm~...what a beautiful beach~it would not lose to the Venus islands~ehehe, the heat of summer, have all been washed away by this cool seawater~
1.japanese: わあ～…きれいな海ですね～！ヴィーナス諸島と同じくらいすごいです！もう暑いのもなにもぜーんぶ、ふっ飛んじゃいました！
1.english: Whoa, the sea is so pretty~! It's as beautiful as the Venus Islands! I'm so blown away, I don't even feel the heat anymore!

2.chinese: 嗯~…真是片美丽的海滩~完全不输维纳斯群岛啊~欸嘿嘿，夏日的炎炎热浪，都被这凉凉的海水驱散了呢~
2.chineseTL: Mmm~...what a beautiful beach~it would not lose to the Venus islands~ehehe, the heat of summer, have all been washed away by this cool seawater~
2.japanese: わあ～…きれいな海ですね～！ヴィーナス諸島と同じくらいすごいです！もう暑いのもなにもぜーんぶ、ふっ飛んじゃいました！
2.english: Whoa, the sea is so pretty~! It's as beautiful as the Venus Islands! I'm so blown away, I don't even feel the heat anymore!

3.chinese: 今天太阳公公也很精神，是个在海边玩耍的好天气呢！
3.chineseTL: Today the sun has a lot of energy, it's a good day to play at the beach!
3.japanese: 今日もお日さま元気いっぱい！海で遊ぶぞ～！
3.english: The sun's shining brightly today! Let's go play in the ocean~!

4.chinese: 这件泳装…会不会太大胆了一点呢…？稍微鼓起了一些勇气才穿上的…那个，感觉…怎么样？
4.chineseTL: This swimsuit...isn't it a bit too daring...? It took a bit of courage to put it on...umm, how...is it?
4.japanese: 今日もお日さま元気いっぱい！海で遊ぶぞ～！
4.english: This swimsuit might be a bit too revealing... It took some courage to put it on... Um, how... is it?

5.chinese: 唔，这个石头下的小洞里，会不会藏着螃蟹什么的？
5.chineseTL: Ooh, these small holes under the rocks, I wonder if there are crabs inside?
5.japanese: うーん…この石の下、蟹さんとかいないのかな～？
5.english: Hmm... I wonder if there's a crab under this rock?

6.chinese: 玛莉！一起来为排球比赛做练习吧！
6.chineseTL: Marie! Let's train for the Beach volleyball competition!
6.japanese: マリーちゃん！一緒にビーチバレーしよう！
6.english: Marie! Let's play beach volleyball together!

7.chinese: 充分的热身运动是很重要的哦，指挥官也来做吧！听我的指挥，一、二！一、二！
7.chineseTL: A good warm up is very important, commander should come do it! On my count, one, two! one, two!
7.japanese: 準備運動は大事なんです！さあ、指揮官さんも一緒に～いっち、にー、いっち、にー…
7.english: Don't forget to do your stretches! Come on, Commander, you should join me~ One, two, one two...

8.chinese: 呼…啊，指挥官也累了吗？一起来休息一下吧~？
8.chineseTL: Hoo...Ah, commander is also tired? Let's take a break~?
8.japanese: ふぅ…あ、指揮官さんも疲れちゃいました？ちょっとお休みしていきませんか～？
8.english: There's a limit to what I'll let you get away with, Commander!

9.chinese: 就算是指挥官，也不可以哦！
9.chineseTL: Even if you're the commander, you're still not allowed to do that!
9.japanese: 指揮官さんでもだめですよ！
9.english: There's a limit to what I'll let you get away with, Commander!

10.chinese: 指挥官，能拜托你帮我拍几张照片吗？嗯，当然是给奶奶也看看这边的风景！
10.chineseTL: Commander, can you take a few photos for me? Mmm, of course it's for grandma to see the view here!
10.japanese: 指揮官さん、写真撮ってもらえますか？おばあちゃんにも見せてあげたくて…あっ…えっと、景色のことですよ？
10.english: Commander, are you taking pictures? Oh, I was asking because I wanted to send some to Grammy... Oh... um, I'm talking about the scenery, not me!
